setting up
```{r}
rm(list=ls())
library(tidyverse)
library("here")
```

Import data
```{r}
tomatoes <- read.csv(here("Data","tomato_data.csv"))
glimpse(tomatoes)
```
Convert data types 
```{r}
tomatoes$Plant_number <- as.factor(tomatoes$Plant_number)
tomatoes$Treatment <- as.factor(tomatoes$Treatment)
```
